description.description: A short description of the item.

reservedTicket.description: A ticket associated with the reservation.

reservationId.description: A unique identifier for the reservation.

additionalType.description: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific  types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a  relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa  syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute  - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding  of extra types, in particular those defined externally.

broker.description: An entity that arranges for an exchange between a buyer and a seller. In  most cases a broker never acquires or releases ownership of a product or  service involved in an exchange. If it is not clear whether an entity is a  broker, seller, or buyer, the latter two terms are preferred. Supersedes  bookingAgent.

image.description: An image of the item. This can be a URL or a fully described ImageObject.

programMembershipUsed.description: Any membership in a frequent flyer, hotel loyalty program, etc. being  applied to the reservation.

mainEntityOfPage.description: Indicates a page (or other CreativeWork) for which this thing is the main  entity being described.  See background notes for details. Inverse property: mainEntity.

potentialAction.description: Indicates a potential Action, which describes an idealized action in which  this thing would play an 'object' role.

boardingGroup.description: The airline-specific indicator of boarding order / preference.

priceCurrency.description: The currency (in 3-letter ISO 4217 format) of the price or a price  component, when attached to PriceSpecification and its subtypes.

reservationStatus.description: The current status of the reservation.

bookingTime.description: The date and time the reservation was booked.

modifiedTime.description: The date and time the reservation was modified.

passengerSequenceNumber.description: The passenger's sequence number as assigned by the airline.

underName.description: The person or organization the reservation or ticket is for.

passengerPriorityStatus.description: The priority status assigned to a passenger for security or boarding (e.g.  FastTrack or Priority).

provider.description: The service provider, service operator, or service performer; the goods  producer. Another party (a seller) may offer those services or goods on  behalf of the provider. A provider may also serve as the seller. Supersedes  carrier.

reservationFor.description: The thing -- flight, event, restaurant,etc. being reserved.

totalPrice.description: The total price for the reservation or ticket, including applicable taxes,  shipping, etc.

securityScreening.description: The type of security screening the passenger is subject to.

sameAs.description: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's  identity. E.g. the URL of the item's Wikipedia page, Freebase page, or  official website.
